channel.title: Benchmark on Chris Titus Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Benchmark on Chris Titus Tech

item.title: SATA vs SAS vs NVMe Performance Breakdown
item.author: contact@christitus.com (Chris Titus)
item.description: This is a quick breakdown of the differences between SATA vs SAS vs NVMe. After looking at the performance below, you will be able to decide which one best suits your needs.
item.dc:creator: Chris Titus

item.title: Using IOMeter to determine hard drive performance
item.author: contact@christitus.com (Chris Titus)
item.description: Using IOMeter will give you a great benchmark on any hard drives and network drives you have. I use this quite often as you can see the effects of new hardware, introducing Link-Aggregation, or troubleshooting drives to determine if they are losing performance.
item.dc:creator: Chris Titus

item.title: How to choose DNS Server by benchmarking them
item.author: contact@christitus.com (Chris Titus)
item.description: By default, your DNS Server is set to your ISP’s DNS and this SLOWS down your internet, due to the fact, they are poorly managed and have horrid performance. This shows you how to choose the fastest DNS Server, but results will vary depending on the location. Running this benchmark will tell you which ones are the best to use.
item.dc:creator: Chris Titus
